response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage over other potential buyers and ensure that you secure this valuable asset. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and hope to hear back from you soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.
